LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.0.label: 배고픔
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.1.label: 매우 배고픔
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.2.label: 굶주림 (초기)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.2.description: 마지막으로 언제 먹었는지 기억도 안나. 집중이 안돼.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.3.label: 굶주림 (약간)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.3.description: 내 몸이 죽어가는게 느껴져. 배가 너무 아파.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.4.label: 굶주림 (중간)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.4.description: 음식밖에 생각이 안나. 뼈가 다 보여. 이대로 죽는걸까?
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.5.label: 굶주림 (심각)
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.5.description: 생각하기도 힘들어. 배가 너무 아파. 기절할거야.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.6.label: 굶주림 (극도)
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.0.label: 피곤
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.1.label: 매우 피곤
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.1.description: 정말 피곤해. 잠깐 누워서 눈만 붙이면...
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.2.label: 탈진
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.2.description: 이제 서있을 수가 없어. 눈이 막 감겨. 조금만...
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.0.label: totally joy-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.0.description: It's been so long since I did anything I truly enjoyed.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.1.label: very joy-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.1.description: I never get to relax and enjoy myself around here.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.2.label: joy-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.2.description: I could really use a break for something enjoyable.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.3.label: joy-filled
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.3.description: I've been having a great time here recently.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.4.label: tons o' joy
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.4.description: I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.0.label: 불편
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.0.description: 아까 좀 불편했어. 앉기 좋은 푹신한걸 구해야 해.
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.1.label: 편함
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.2.label: 매우 편함
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.3.label: 엄청 편함
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.4.label: 사치스럽게 편함
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.0.label: 끔찍한 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.0.description: 정말 참을 수가 없어. 나가야 해...
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.1.label: 매우 나쁜 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.2.label: 나쁜 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.3.label: 만족스러운 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.4.label: 매우 만족스러운 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.5.label: 황홀한 환경
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.5.description: 아름다운 곳이야. 내 삶을 사랑해도 되겠어.
LanguageData.NeedSpace.stages.0.label: 좁아터진 공간
